output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - "CMF11240017" is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Has significant reach (25,000-29,999 impressions) - Uses campaign hashtag "#caleasigurapentruromania"
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes government achievements under Marcel Ciolacu's leadership - Uses positive messaging about government programs - Links local success stories to Ciolacu's leadership - Is part of a door-to-door campaign effort
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a campaign message, not journalistic content - Personal experience narrative with political messaging - Contains campaign identifier (CMF)
6. Personal opinion: No - This is a structured campaign message - Paid distribution - Official campaign materials with CMF

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is a paid advertisement with wide reach - Links positive achievements to the candidate - Uses campaign hashtags and messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie, prin postarea cu ID 792635229631100 pe Facebook. Postarea promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, contine numar CMF (11240017), si a fost difuzata ca reclama platita dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul face referire directa la realizarile guvernamentale ale candidatului, foloseste hashtag-uri de campanie, si are scop electoral explicit, fiind distribuit contra cost catre un public larg (25,000-29,999 impresii).
